Docs.summary: Defines a webpage that is relevant to the query.

Public Sub New (Optional id As String = null, Optional webSearchUrl As String = null, Optional name As String = null, Optional url As String = null, Optional description As String = null, Optional bingId As String = null, Optional thumbnailUrl As String = null, Optional provider As IList(Of Thing) = null, Optional text As String = null, Optional displayUrl As String = null, Optional snippet As String = null, Optional deepLinks As IList(Of WebPage) = null, Optional dateLastCrawled As String = null, Optional searchTags As IList(Of WebMetaTag) = null)

new Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.WebPage : string * string * string * string * string * string * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.Thing> * string * string * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.WebPage> * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.WebMetaTag> -> Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.WebPage
MemberSignature.Usage: new Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Search.CustomSearch.Models.WebPage (id, webSearchUrl, name, url, description, bingId, thumbnailUrl, provider, text, displayUrl, snippet, deepLinks, dateLastCrawled, searchTags)

Docs.param: The URL To Bing's search result for this item.
The name of the thing represented by this object.
The URL to get more information about the thing represented by this object.
A short description of the item.
An ID that uniquely identifies this item.
The URL to a thumbnail of the item.
The source of the creative work.
The display URL of the webpage. The URL is meant for display purposes only and is not well formed.
A snippet of text from the webpage that describes its contents.
A list of links to related content that Bing found in the website that contains this webpage. The Webpage object in this context includes only the name, url, urlPingSuffix, and snippet fields.
The last time that Bing crawled the webpage. The date is in the form, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS. For example, 2015-04-13T05:23:39.

A list of search tags that the webpage owner specified on the webpage. The API returns only indexed search tags. The name field of the MetaTag object contains the indexed search tag. Search tags begin with search.* (for example, search.assetId). The content field contains the tag's value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WebPage class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DateLastCrawled As String

Docs.summary: Gets the last time that Bing crawled the webpage. The date is in the form, YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS. For example, 2015-04-13T05:23:39.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeepLinks As IList(Of WebPage)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of links to related content that Bing found in the website that contains this webpage. The Webpage object in this context includes only the name, url, urlPingSuffix, and snippet fields.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayUrl As String

Docs.summary: Gets the display URL of the webpage. The URL is meant for display purposes only and is not well formed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SearchTags As IList(Of WebMetaTag)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of search tags that the webpage owner specified on the webpage. The API returns only indexed search tags. The name field of the MetaTag object contains the indexed search tag. Search tags begin with search.* (for example, search.assetId). The content field contains the tag's value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Snippet As String

Docs.summary: Gets a snippet of text from the webpage that describes its contents.
